Key Match Events: Belgium recorded a 2-0 win against Romania.
Kevin De Bruyne doubled Belgium's lead to seal all three points.
Belgium had a goal ruled out by VAR for offside.
Belgium led Romania 1-0 at half-time thanks to an early strike.
Jeremy Doku assisted Romelu Lukaku, who laid it off for Youri Tielemans to score Belgium's opener.
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium faced Romania in the final game of the day.
The match was crucial for Group E standings.
